name: Slide Golf Mini
description:
Are you ready for an incredible Mini Golf game? Slide Golf Mini is a 1-2 player golf game that offers two 18 hole courses a 19th hole versus mode and a Golf Shop with new balls and backgrounds. There is now a reward system for a hole in one and course scores. Can you set a course record?

All Items are purchased via earned in game coins, there are NO in app purchases.

Big Thanks to my early supporters, please let me know if you have any issues or what features you would like added.
